replies.msg:
想像一下你係個sender

當用plain text→ receiver public key→ sender private key → cipher text個陣

Sender通常係server，會對好多個client。如果用Receiver(Client) public key加密，再用sender(server) private key加密，你咪要知道receiver(client)嘅public key先加到第一次密。之後你仲要再用自己(server)條private key加第二次密。咁總共要execute 2次RSA。

例如：
Client A Client B Client C 同時問 Server X 攞 1個需要證書認證嘅file，Server X要execute 6次RSA。

(Plain text-->A public key(RSA 1)-->X private key (RSA 2)->cipher text A)
(Plain text-->B public key(RSA 3)-->X private key (RSA 4)->cipher text B)
(Plain text-->C public key(RSA 5)-->X private key (RSA 6)->cipher text C)

Total number of RSA execution = 6

當用 plain text →sender private key → receiver public key → cipher text

Server X (Sender) 可以用自己Private key 加密咗先，之後擺喺Temp/Cache。之後Client(Receiver) A,B,C要個file。佢只需要為每個copy run 1次RSA。

例如：
Client D Client E Client F 同時問 Server Y 攞 1個需要證書認證嘅file，Server Y只需要execute 4次RSA。

(Plain text →Y private key(RSA 1)->intermediate cipher text )
(intermediate cipher text-->D public key(RSA 2)->cipher text D)
(intermediate cipher text-->E public key(RSA 3)->cipher text E)
(intermediate cipher text-->F public key(RSA 4)->cipher text F)

Total number of RSA execution = 4


咁樣可以慳番執行RSA嘅次數，慳咗Processing Power、CPU Time，而且慳電左。

利申：ICT 5** 、 Degree IT Course A (Raw mark 9x%)
多謝各位晚巴打教導
